column3: [[2009]]) was a German Anglicist and Catholic writer. He was known primarily for his anthologies and review papers on Christian-oriented fiction. In [[1983]]
column5: dedicated to the scientific study of the [[Inklings]]. 'Die Inklings-Gesellschaft' publishes the yearbook ''[[Inklings: Jahrbuch für Literatur und Ästhetik|Jahrbuch für Literatur und Ästhetik]]'' ("Annual Review of Literature and Aesthetics").<ref>[http://www.kathpedia.com/index.php/Gisbert_Kranz Kathpedia]
